headline: Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) Rose as its Revenue And Earnings Surpassed Street Expectations
summary: Baron Funds, an investment management company, released its “Baron Health Care Fund” fourth quarter 2024 investor letter. The Fund performed roughly in line with the Benchmark, during a challenging quarter for the larger health care industry. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund declined 9.58% (Institutional Shares) in the quarter compared […]

headline: Intuitive Surgical is Known for Selling $1 Million Surgical Robots. But Here's How it Actually Makes Most of its Revenue.
summary: Intuitive Surgical (NASDAQ: ISRG), best known for its flagship da Vinci robot, is the global leader in the robotic surgery market.  The da Vinci, available in several versions including the latest da Vinci 5, generates billions of dollars of revenue annually, and this performance has helped the company's stock soar over the near term and the long term.  Considering da Vinci models cost more than $1 million, you would expect this robotic surgery giant to generate most of its revenue through the sales of these platforms.
